title: Imran Khan, Shah Mahmooq Qureshi indicted in cipher case
description: ISLAMABAD-  A special court on Monday indicted Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf (PTI) Chairman Imran Khan and Vice-Chairman Shah Mahmood Qureshi in the cipher case. The court, established under the Official Secret Act, was presided over by Judge Abu Hasnat Zulqarnain at Adiala jail. During the hearing, Imran Khan vehemently denied allegations of corruption, characterizing the case as […]
